name: Extravagant Slumber
effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.
description: Layla's specialty. The scattered nuts are like stars dotted in the deep and quiet night sky. After just one bite, your body and mind after a day's work suddenly felt relaxed and peaceful. When you told Layla about that feeling, she showed a mixed expression of joy and regret — "Th—That's great! Ah, if only it could work for me too."
